Content: <icon id='Target_CripplingBlow' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow'/>[Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] deals additional <font color='#CD1F1F'>piercing damage</font> to disabled targets.

<icon id='MultiStrike_BlinkStrike' icon='Skill_Warrior_BlinkStrike'/>[Key:MultiStrike_BlinkStrike_DisplayName] applies Vulnerable to targets hit. Vulnerable lasts until the end of your turn, and deals a one-time amount of bonus damage on hit.

<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam;Rush_BullRush' icon='Skill_Warrior_BatteringRam;Skill_Polymorph_BullRush'/>If under the effects of War Charge, deal 25% more damage and gain Hasted after using a rush skill.<icon id='Shout_InspireStart' icon='Skill_Warrior_Inspire'/>Fear, Madness, and Sleep are cleansed from encouraged allies.
<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_BasicAttack;LLWEAPONEX_CONCUSSION' icon='Action_AttackGround;LLWEAPONEX_Status_Concussion' type='1;2'/> Basic attacks have a chance to give the target a Concussion.
<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam' icon='Skill_Warrior_BatteringRam'/>[Key:Rush_BatteringRam_DisplayName] has a 25% chance to apply Dizzy for 1 turn.
<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow'/>[Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] applies Sundered, reducing max Physical and Magic Armor by 25%.
<icon id='Cone_GroundSmash' icon='Skill_Warrior_GroundSmash'/>[Key:Cone_GroundSmash_DisplayName] creates a localized quake at the point of initial impact, dealing bonus damage in a 3m radius.
<icon id='Projectile_PinDown' icon='Skill_Ranger_PinDown'/>[Key:Projectile_PinDown_DisplayName] shoots two arrows instead of one, hitting a random nearby enemy for half damage.
<icon id='Projectile_SkyShot' icon='Skill_Ranger_SkyShot'/>[Key:Projectile_SkyShot_DisplayName] deals a guaranteed critical hit to targets that are Knocked Down.
<icon id='Projectile_ThrowingKnife' icon='Skill_Rogue_ThrowingKnife'/>[Key:Projectile_ThrowingKnife_DisplayName] is enhanced with a chance to do bonus damage.
<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam;Rush_BullRush' icon='Skill_Warrior_BatteringRam;Skill_Polymorph_BullRush'/>You are immune to surface damage while using rush skills.
<icon id='Jump_TacticalRetreat' icon='Skill_Ranger_TacticalRetreat'/>After using [Key:Jump_TacticalRetreat_DisplayName], your next action's AP cost is reduced by 1.
<icon id='Projectile_Ricochet' icon='Skill_Ranger_Ricochet'/>Each ricochet bounce deals splash damage in a 2m radius.

<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot' icon='LLWEAPONEX_Skills_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost1]% more base damage.<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind' icon='Skill_Warior_WhirlWind'/>While spinning, shoot 1-3 enemies in a 6m radius.
<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot' icon='LLWEAPONEX_Skills_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost2]% more base damage.
<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot' icon='LLWEAPONEX_Skills_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost3]% more base damage.
<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot' icon='LLWEAPONEX_Skills_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost4]% more base damage.
<icon id='MultiStrike_Vault' icon='Skill_Rogue_Vault'/>After teleporting, your next attack deals 50% more damage.
<icon id='Shout_Adrenaline' icon='Skill_Rogue_Adrenaline'/>Gain hyper-focus, increasing the damage of the next shot of your pistol by 50%.
<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow'/>[Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] deals 25% splash damage around the target in a 3m radius.
<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam;Rush_BullRush' icon='Skill_Warrior_BatteringRam;Skill_Polymorph_BullRush'/>After rushing, gain 25% Dodge and deflect the next attack or projectile.
<icon id='Target_SingleHandedAttack' icon='Skill_SuckerPunch'/>Gain follow-up combo skills after punching a target. 25% chance to increase Sucker Punch's Knockdown by 1 turn.

<icon id='Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Air;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Earth;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Fire;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Poison;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Water;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Chaos' icon='LLWEAPONEX_Skills_Runeblade_Activate_Air;LLWEAPONEX_Skills_Runeblade_Activate_Earth;LLWEAPONEX_Skills_Runeblade_Activate_Fire;LLWEAPONEX_Skills_Runeblade_Activate_Poison;LLWEAPONEX_Skills_Runeblade_Activate_Water;LLWEAPONEX_Skills_Runeblade_Activate_Chaos'/>The next spell you cast with the same element of your activated rune deals 25% more damage.

<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind' icon='Skill_Warior_WhirlWind'/>[Key:Shout_Whirlwind_DisplayName] consumes bleeding on targets hit to deal a burst of piercing damage. Damage increases for each turn of Bleeding.
<icon id='Shout_RecoverArmour' icon='Skill_Shield'/>Damage from the next hit taken is reduced by 50%.
<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind' icon='Skill_Warior_WhirlWind'/>Targets hit by [Key:Shout_Whirlwind_DisplayName] have their resistance to your staff's element reduced by 25%.

<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow'/>Targets hit by [Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] gain a -20% damage debuff until their turn ends. You deal 10% more damage against them until your turn ends.

<icon id='Projectile_Grenade_PoisonFlask;Projectile_Grenade_Molotov;Projectile_Grenade_OilFlask;Projectile_Grenade_WaterBalloon' icon='Item_GRN_PoisonFlask;Item_GRN_Molotov;Item_GRN_OilFlask;Item_GRN_WaterBalloon'/>Basic grenades have a 25% chance to explode again.

<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow;Shout_Whirlwind;Rush_BatteringRam' icon='Skill_Warrior_CripplingBlow;Skill_Warior_WhirlWind;Skill_Warrior_BatteringRam'/>Warfare skills can now be used while unarmed.<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedBasicAttack' icon='Action_AttackGround'/>Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost1]% extra base damage in total, and scale with your highest base attribute (Strength, Finesse, or Constitution).
Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost2]% extra base damage in total.
Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost3]% extra base damage in total.
Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost4]% extra base damage in total, making it comparable to the damage of a two-handed weapon.

<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_BasicAttack' icon='Action_AttackGround'/>Basic attacks now lower the target's resistance to your wand's element by -25% for 1 turn.<icon id='Shout_FleshSacrifice' icon='Skill_Decay_FleshSacrifice'/>Allies standing on blood surfaces gain a [Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_BloodEmpowered:DamageBonus]% damage bonus.
